poem:
Title: In Memoriam of Zoe on the M25

Zoe, fleeting, forty and fine,
on life's motorway, in the twist of time.
Essex-born birthday journey denied,
your story written on the M25's side.
In siren's pursuit, a cruel, cruel tide,
One metallic clash, a role model died. 
Through bitter tears, the loved ones cried,
Your journey stopped, but in hearts, you reside.
